评论详情: Very unique, great fit and comfortable. A little long but the toggle at the bottom tightens them to desired opening
just what i was looking for. comfy and lightweight. perfect for work out. ordered in a size large and fits good.

评论概述: Style is great but sizing is misleading.
评论详情: Pros: Style, material, and quality is spot on.  Cons: Order 1-2 sizes up.. I’m a 34 waist and ordered L, had to replace for a XL! The hips and thighs are slender fit.

评论概述: Plastic pants with pockets, teen approved
评论详情: Large fits perfectly on my lanky teenager. He lives in black pants over the winter and these are ideal for incoming cooler weather as they’re not too warm and uber-loose. He wants whatever other colors I can find. He says the big cargo pockets on the legs are ideal for his stuff. He travels with hand-held video game consoles, his phone, a wallet, and some shades.
Paring with a burgundy shirt doing a street wear look for my hubby family reunion
